attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-1162

Date: 2013-11-07

His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to subsection 12(2) of the Bankruptcy and Insolvency Act, appoints the following officers of the Office of the Superintendent of Bankruptcy of the Department of Industry to hold office during pleasure as official receivers for all bankruptcy districts and divisions in Canada:

 

(a) Tarun Arneja of Brampton, Ontario;

(b) Gerry Barberio of Kirkland, Quebec;

(c) Marie Blondeau of Montréal, Quebec;

(d) Lissette Bonilla of Montréal, Quebec;

(e) Tania Bussières of Sorel-Tracy, Quebec;

(f) Vanessa Chung of Toronto, Ontario;

(g) Mary Ellen de Leon of Winnipeg, Manitoba;

(h) Alain Deschênes of Mercier, Quebec;

(i) Thuy Doan of Toronto, Ontario;

(j) Éric Drouin of Carignan, Quebec;

(k) Isabelle Gervais of Ottawa, Ontario;

(l) Arlana Gillis of Ottawa, Ontario;

(m) Doug Hamilton of Bedford, Nova Scotia;

(n) Thomas Kwan of Vancouver, British Columbia;

(o) Chun Fai, (Spencer) Lee of Vancouver, British Columbia;

(p) Stephanie Lee of Toronto, Ontario;

(q) Denise Legaré of Gatineau, Quebec;

(r) Charmaine Marks of Burlington, Ontario;

(s) Julie-Ann Miguel of Woodbrige, Ontario;

(t) Nicholas Millen of Gatineau, Quebec;

(u) Stephanie Moriarity of Toronto, Ontario;

(v) Juliette Pierre of Montréal, Quebec;

(w) Kevin Ramkissoon of Scarborough, Ontario;

(x) Magali Roux of Montréal, Quebec;

(y) Joëlle Saulnier-Labrie of Gatineau, Quebec;

…/2

 


- 2 -

 

(z) Beverly Seto of Richmond, British Columbia;

(aa) Charles Skelton of Toronto, Ontario;

(bb) Mai Lan Thi (Julie) Tran of Vancouver, British Columbia;

(cc) Jessica Vingerhoeds-Carbino of Montréal, Quebec; and

(dd) Lily Shun Wa Yiu of Richmond, British Columbia.

 


Sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu du paragraphe 12(2) de la Loi sur la faillite et l’insolvabilité, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil nomme séquestres officiels, à titre amovible, pour tous les districts et toutes les divisions de faillites au Canada, les fonctionnaires ci-après du Bureau du surintendant des faillites du ministère de l’Industrie :

 

a) Tarun Arneja de Brampton (Ontario);

b) Gerry Barberio de Kirkland (Québec);

c) Marie Blondeau de Montréal (Québec);

d) Lissette Bonilla de Montréal (Québec);

e) Tania Bussières de Sorel-Tracy (Québec);

f) Vanessa Chung de Toronto (Ontario);

n) Thomas Kwan de Vancouver (Colombie-Britanique);

o) Chun Fai (Spencer) Lee de Vancouver (Colombie-Britanique);

p) Stephanie Lee de Toronto (Ontario);

q) Denise Legaré de Gatineau (Québec);

r) Charmaine Marks de Burlington (Ontario);

x) Magali Roux de Montréal (Québec);
